 2015-03662015-03-26,  ,  ,  ,  NR
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of SHERRA PROFIT of Summerside, Prince Edward Island, to the position of special adviser to the Minister of National Revenue, to be known as the Taxpayers' Ombudsman, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective July 6, 2015.
